pr_title: ISPN-11868: add hint about no default cache for spring session

timeline.bodyText: Can we add a link to the docs that show how todo this?
timeline.author: ryanemerson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -12,3 +12,9 @@ Complete this procedure to use Spring Session in your project.
 - `@EnableCaching`
 - `@EnableInfinispanRemoteHttpSession`
 - `@EnableInfinispanEmbeddedHttpSession`
+
+[NOTE]
+====
+{brandname} does not provide a default cache. To use Spring Session, you must
+add a {brandname} cache configuration.
+====

timeline.message: add hint about no default cache for spring session
add hint about no default cache for spring session
